parallel.distributed

Class DBarrierRmRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DBarrierRmRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DMsgIntf

    public class DBarrierRmRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements DMsgIntf
    class implementing a DBarrier Remove Request for the associated thread that called the relevant DBarrier.removeCurrentThread() method. Not for use as part of the public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors

      DBarrierRmRequest(java.lang.String bname)
      public constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      if the object is a DSendMsg calls the sendData() method on an appropriate parallel.MsgPassingCoordinator and once the data are safely sent, it sends back to the other end of the connecting socket an parallel.distributed.OKReply object, else if it's a DRecvMsg, calls the recvData() and once data are received, sends them to the other end of the socket.
      java.lang.String toString()

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
